A new kind of web analytics for a multi-channel device world

Explore the Netbiscuits Content Academy

Visitor Flow for customer journey analysis

What Is Netbiscuits?

Netbiscuits Analytics enables digital marketers to measure the performance of multiscreen content marketing. Customers now visit websites using a wider variety of devices than ever before – PCs, smartphones, tablets, phablets, SmartTVs and more. We help you measure how your customers engage with your content across all those devices. Then we present the results in a uniquely visual way, so you don’t need a team of data scientists to make sense of it. Here’s a handy Product Overview Guide to tell you more.

Analytics
Device Detection

Sounds Intriguing, How Does It Work?

Netbiscuits Analytics crunches your visitor data and turns it into highly visual Smart Dashboards covering overall traffic, user journeys, bounce rates and conversion metrics. Each dashboard contains a wealth of context-specific visitor data you can drill down into to optimize your content. That allows you to decide which content works best for which visitors based on their individual context. Netbiscuits Device Detection then allows your technical team to ensure your site shows that content to those visitors where and when you specify. We take the guesswork out of creating consistent and satisfying user journeys.
